TopicTitle: I Return To An Old Love

Articles.Content: Hey! I'm a returning KSP player, back from the dead. I was obsessed with this game when I was younger, and it feels good to be back. Everything is different! My baby grew up! For all intents and purposes, you can consider me a new player.

Hello TooManyIdeas and welcome to the forum!

Well, the fundamentals of orbital mechanics all still apply.  But, yeah, the game has come a long way even in the time I've been playing.  (Since 0.23.5)


Happy landings!
Welcome back, TooManyIdeas! When did you start playing?
If you left in 0.7.3, A LOT has changed
I started playing around 18.2, but I left at 1.0. It's amazing how much the game has changed in just two updates. We have an in-game manual, for crying out loud! What's next, flying cars?
